Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone. We realize that the 0.16 release has been pretty rocky, particularly for Mac users. We had a few problems with deploying 0.16, and eventually had to roll back the new system and didn\'t have enough time to test the deployment to the old one. We realize this has caused several major problems via your feedback, and we\'re working on fixes.

However, please realize that this is the weekend and much of the company is out trying to decompress from the stresses of the work week. Because of this, we won\'t be able to deploy the aforementioned fixes until Monday, or until we manage to get a hold of someone who can package and deploy the fixes. We realize this isn\'t ideal for you, the customer, but we\'re trying to get these fixes delivered to you as soon as possible.

Until then, before reporting any issues, please read this hurriedly-prepared list of known issues. I\'ll try to keep them updated.

Thank you for understanding.
